name: costa market bag
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here][1].

tote all of your beach essentials or market finds in the costa bag, available in three sizes to ensure it will work for any occasion. a simple stitch mixed with a unique construction makes this classic net bag look polished and professional!

shop the full kit [here][2].

**sizes**
mini (medium, maxi)

**finished dimensions**
width: 13 (15, 17)”/33 (38, 43)cm
length: 13 (15, 17)”/33 (38, 43)cm
straps: 17”/43cm

**difficulty level**
intermediate

**skills**
single crochet
single crochet decreases
half double crochet
half double crochet decreases
working into chain spaces
working flat and in the round
crocheting into the sides of a row

all patterns are written in standard us terms.
